name: Don't let your goblins sink in the sink
name_original: Don't let your goblins sink in the sink
description:
A game about being a mother to 6 terrible little goblins (and a cat and rabbit) who have a knack for getting into trouble, try to split your attention across the whole house and keep your gobbos safe from themselves

This is the first game by the 3 sibling Thompson/Carden power team.

Made for Extra Credits Game Jam #6

controls:

move and jump with WASD

help your goblins with E
